venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for our second meetup in May!

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $19 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Once we have more regular meetups with more regular attendees, I would love to reduce the fee for everyone! Anything received in excess of the $19 will be put toward the next month OR donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde
item.how_to_find_us: Join us in the small enclosure.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: May French Bulldog Meetup - part deux!
